subject: Affiliate partnership — Social Trading Vlog (66K YouTube subs, multi-language European content)
body:
Hi,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog — a YouTube channel and website focused on social trading and online investing, with a strong European audience.

I'm expanding my content to cover a wider range of investment platforms, and DEGIRO is a natural fit given my audience demographics.

Here's what I bring to the table:

- YouTube: 66,400+ subscribers, 4.5 million total views, 335 videos
- Top video: 826,000+ views on retail trading content
- Website: socialtradingvlog.com — SEO-optimised with interactive comparison tools and educational content
- Multi-language content: site translated into Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, and Arabic — directly targeting the European markets where DEGIRO operates
- Audience: retail investors comparing platforms, many in DEGIRO's core markets (Netherlands, Germany, France, Spain, and more)
- Based in Malta (EU), creating content since 2016 — nearly 10 years of documented investing experience

DEGIRO is already featured on my interactive platform comparison tool at socialtradingvlog.com/calculators/compare-platforms/, where visitors can compare features, fees, and regulation across major platforms.

I'm also producing comparison articles targeting keywords like 'eToro vs DEGIRO' and 'best investment platform Europe' — content that reaches people at the exact moment they're deciding which platform to use.

The fact that my site is available in 5 European languages means I can drive qualified traffic from multiple DEGIRO markets simultaneously. This is rare for a single content creator.

I'd love to discuss partnership terms, particularly:
- Enhanced CPA or CPL rates reflecting the quality of my multi-language European traffic
- Whether you offer performance tiers for higher-volume affiliates
- Any content or promotional support

Happy to provide detailed analytics or discuss over a call.

Best regards,
Tom West
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://www.youtube.com/socialtrading
